pages.title: Crystals
pages.text: These crystals are mysterious and fragile. They shine in a myriad of colours. $(br2)Crystals can be crushed with a Crushing Block to get random shards. They can also be thrown into a Nether Portal to create Nether Crystals.

pages.title: Smelting Crystals
pages.text: To obtain these crystals, craft a Mysterious Mixture and then smelt the mixture to create a crystal block. The Crystal Block can then be divided into Crystals.
